title: Online Teacher Professional Development: Science Education Innovation Through Culturally Responsive Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science subject knowledge and experience with online learning environments
context.additional_context: Aiming to strengthen educational capabilities in scientific fields as a professional, requiring instructional design that reflects diverse cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more principles for designing science lessons that consider cultural differences.
Learners can create at least one microlearning content based on culturally responsive teaching methods applicable in mobile environments.
Learners can complete at least one science education project outcome incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
